text: @realDonaldTrump Do you have ANY idea how much better your life would be if you could admit making a mistake? You’re so hollow inside that it’s painful to witness. What if you’d said, “I made a mistake early on about  #COVID19, but if we all work hard & sacrifice together as UNITED States:..”‽
